root.name: Russian Dancing Men
root.description: OverviewRussian Dancing Men is a rhythm/action game developed by SmashMouth Games for the iPhone and iPad platforms. Russian Dancing Men is based on an animated video created by Weebl for the Weebl's Stuff website.GameplayRussian Dancing Men features many songs created by Weebl, including the song of the same title as the game. The player takes control of a line of Russian dancing men which are continuously moving from the left of the screen to the right.In between the start and finish lines there are a series of obstacles in which the player must avoid by pressing the on screen button that corresponds to the specific obstacle.ObstaclesThere are four different obstacle types in Russian Dancing Men.BlocksPitsSpikesLoops
